About Me

I have 7 years of experience in web and mobile technologies. I describe my work style as pragmatic, proactive, user focused, and thorough. My communication and organisational skills coupled with my experience with digital design and business skill make me a valuable contributor to a larger team. I value a positive environment, and collaboration.

I hold a Masters of Entrepreneurship from Otago University, and a Bachelor of Design from Victoria University.
